nodes.title: Compatibility with android studio version 0.3.0
compatibility with android studio v. 0.3.0
do not serialize stuff twice
Feature Added: Clicking on a Nick in the Nicklist opens a Buffer with th...
Reconnect on loss of connection
fixes #106: crash on opening buffer or nick list while connecting
Compatibility with Android Studio 0.2.5
Use the selected theme in preferences
Feature: Added option to only receive sound notifications when app is not in focus
minor updates
Fixed highlights so that action messages (/me) will trigger highlights.
Another minor issue with mIRC formatting/colours
Classpath file has environment/developer-specific paths
Fix force close introduced in previous commit
handle more network messages
add history to ChatInputView
format latency and show more network info
added option to show core latency
handle KeyEvent.KEYCODE_NUMPAD_ENTER
added option to show network latency
add menu option to hide buffers and handle addbuffer messages
remove theme attribute from PreferenceView activity
lint fixes
Fixed mIRC Colours/Formatting
Show (off)/(away) after queryname if user is offline/away
Please pull. Fixed bug preventing Quassel from working on my Xoom.
Fixed crash on start up
Update build.gradle
Fix Android Oreo font color
Random performance improvements
Fix race condition with LAST_SEEN while receiving messages
Add Spanish translation
Call disconnectFromCore() so the service actually stops.
adds files for Spanish translation
Clarified wake-lock text to show it works on Android 2.3 and below
Add support for Pebble smartwatches
Synchronize on same object
Add disconnect action to notification.
Skip animation on returnToLogin() from onResume()
Fix the connection crash on Jelly Bean or below
Fix another alphabetization problem with the nick list
Fixed a crash on joining a channel in a newly created Network
Re-introduce support for network status buffer topics
Fix removing networks while Quasseldroid is running
Fix stuck "Connecting" message
Fix styling of NOTICE messages
Removed unnecessary Google stuff from .travis.yml
String cleanup
Changed "settings" to "preferences"
Removed crittercism
Clicking on a notification now opens the correct buffer
Fixed Netsplits not being hidden by "Hide events"
Redesigned the UI slightly
Recreate the connected notification with proper priority if the setting changes
New, updated colorscheme
More Colors!
Fixed a small layout bug in the chat view
Updated the colorscheme
Changed minimum SDK version back to Gingerbread (7)
Fixed several UI bugs
Adding a network does not make the app unusable anymore
Fixed #209
Fixed #207
Fixed #203
Added Tablet layout for 720dp and 960dp width
Removed ActionBarSherlock
Add formatting for INVITE messages
reconnect after disconnecting
Fix SSL cert validation against built-in root CAs
Material Design, UI and UX improvements and quite a lot of bugfixes
Unhide permanently hidden buffer upon joining
Fix ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException in IrcMessage::getHostmask() with senders with no "!"
Input widget will no longer lose typed text when pressing "down" on D-pad
New holo-style icons for the nick list expanders.
New icons from Joppu.
Show buffer activity/unread/highlights even when parted.
Fix crashing when a user joins a channel while init is incomplete
Support Network setCurrentServer messages.
Add support for Network setNetworkName messages.
Fix multiple topic-updating issues.
Compatibility with Android Studio 0.5.1
Reorder the init process to improve perceived performance.
Fix "Receiving Backlog" after destroying and rebuilding activity.
Speling erors.
Retrieve the Id of the BufferViewConfig from BufferViewManager instead of hard-coding 0.
Add support for the new handshake and for streaming compression.
Display the hostmask with JOIN, PART, QUIT, and KILL messages.
Fix the message displayed on changing one's own nick.
Restore chat textbox to old behavior.
Compatibility with Android Studio 0.4.2
Check for Connecting/Connected in LoginActivity
Don't trigger "highlight" notifications in response to "away" messages
Fixed FC when processing a "kick" event without a "reason" specified
Send real ClientVersion.
Support ClientInitReject messages.
Implemented automatic reconnecting
Initialize Buffer topic to the empty string.
Update Otto to 1.3.4.
Depend on android-support instead of shipping the JAR.
Update ActionBarSherlock to 4.4.0.
Fix backlog request with size greater than remaining backlog.
Hack to fix scrolling on GB.
Stack chat ListView from bottom.
Fix math issue in netsplit formatting code.
Fix crash when rotating while connecting.
Info messages should be formatted the same as Server messages.
Fix unhiding of temporarily-hidden buffers.
Make the zone for drawer-pulling wider in order to more easily open the drawers.
Fix a few more crashes.
Fix the join race in the netsplit join handling code too.
Use the same buffer highlight color that the regular Quassel client uses
Send requests for user and channel init data out of CoreConnService
Fix several more crash bugs.
Set query buffers as active when the user is away too.
Allow for installation on SD card.
Make each Network observe its own statusBuffer.
Fix duplicate initialization of userAwayBitmap in BufferFragment.java.
First attempt at support for adding and removing users from nick lists during netsplits.
Various formatting fixes for ChatFragment.java.
Add "[]" around the nick in NOTICE messages to match the formatting used by regular Quassel.
Update CoreConnection.java and CoreInfo.java to work properly with the latest updates to the Quassel core.
Fix text coloring of queries in the buffer list.
Fix the nick list alphabetization problem.
Do not assign the network name to network status buffers.
Fix crashes occurring after deleting a buffer.
Remove unneeded code to process commands beginning with "/", as this is done by the core.
Update CoreConnection.java and CoreInfo.java to work properly with the latest updates to the Quassel core.
